content:
/>
XI.ii.3.A.4.b
.
Definition:  Evidence in the File at the Date of Death
Evidence in the file at date of death
means evidence in VA’s possession on or before the date of the beneficiary’s death, even if the evidence was not physically located in the VA claims folder on or before the date of death.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A  - Entitlement to Accrued Benefits Under 38 U.S.C. 5121
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
